outline.title: Oracle Smart Recruitment System
outline.summary: Title slide introducing the technical architecture presentation with system name and subtitle
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: System Overview
outline.summary: High-level overview of the Oracle Smart Recruitment System, its purpose as an AI-powered B2B SaaS platform, and key capabilities including 10,000+ attribute matching, pay-for-performance billing, and ATS integrations
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Technology Stack
outline.summary: Comprehensive breakdown of the technology stack including React 19, Tailwind CSS 4, Express 4, tRPC 11, Drizzle ORM, MySQL/TiDB, and key libraries for AI, real-time communication, and data processing
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Architecture Layers
outline.summary: Three-tier architecture design showing frontend layer (React + Tailwind), backend layer (Express + tRPC), and data layer (MySQL + S3 storage) with communication patterns
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Data Model & Schema
outline.summary: Core database entities including users, candidates, employers, jobs, applications, interviews, and their relationships. Highlights JSON fields for flexible attribute storage and AI-inferred data
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: AI Matching Engine
outline.summary: AI-powered matching algorithm that calculates skill match, culture fit, and wellbeing scores using 10,000+ attributes. Integration with OpenAI for profile enrichment and inference
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: tRPC API Architecture
outline.summary: Type-safe API design using tRPC with end-to-end type safety, superjson serialization, protected and public procedures, and modular router organization
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: KSA Market Differentiation
outline.summary: Saudization compliance engine with real-time Nitaqat calculation, MHRSD and Qiwa integration, workforce tracking, and what-if scenario simulation for Saudi market
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: B2B SaaS Capabilities
outline.summary: Enterprise features including pulse surveys, organizational health tracking, skill gap analysis, team performance analytics, and labor market intelligence collection
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Pay-for-Performance Billing
outline.summary: Automated billing system supporting subscription, performance-based, and hybrid models. Tracks qualified applications and scheduled interviews for performance billing
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: External Integrations
outline.summary: ATS integrations, email delivery via SendGrid, calendar sync with Google Calendar, S3 storage for files, real-time notifications via Socket.io, and government API integrations
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Architecture Summary
outline.summary: Closing slide summarizing the robust, scalable, and AI-powered architecture designed for the Saudi recruitment market with enterprise-grade features
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed
